channel.title: Bejeweled 2 script needed
channel.description:
I noticed that in SCAR under the scripts folder there was a Bejeweled script..so I figured that it would be possible for somebody to make a Bejeweled 2 script. This is the website that I found Bejeweled 2 on, I'm not sure if you need it, maybe websites have different versions of the game, but here it is.
http://inboxdollars.skilljam.com/front/front.asp
If the script is good enough, I may offer a few $$ to the person who makes this script, I'm not sure how much, but I'm thinking about 5$
